markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 15"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Busine of Divine Reinforcement](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1566)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Good" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=83" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 89</row>

**Price** 6,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 1
</row>

**Access** Knights of Lastwall have access to this item.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This long, straight, trumpet-like instrument is made of well-polished brass and adorned with imagery of angels fighting demons or religious symbols. When played as an instrument, the busine generates powerful and harmonious notes and grants a +2 item bonus to [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks.

<document level="2" id="action-1179" />

<document level="2" id="action-1180" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
